item.title: Ken Wark on Chantal Mouffe
item.description: For my transcription exercise I wanted to pick something that was a) short enough so that I could transcribe the whole thing b) interesting enough that I wouldn’t mind listening to it over and over again c) spoken slowly enough that I would only have to pause and rewind ten seconds 500 times and not 1000. I’d recently watched to MacKenzie Wark’s edutainment video on Chantal Mouffe for DIS magazine (now just DIS?
